title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 20 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 20 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Senator Ted Cruz calls in to talk about NBA wokeness. Half million illegals have crossed the border so far. The Biden Administration is totally responsible for the crisis at the border. Biden/Harris counting on the media to never shine a light on their failures. Democrat's infrastructure bill will just lead to more and more inflation. Sen. Dick Durbin had a moment of truth: Illegal immigrants are more likely to vote democrat. Callers weigh in on covid infected illegals crossing the border and then released into the country. CNN has lost 75% of its audience since Trump left office.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
